-- basic.go --
package basic

import "context"

//encore:api public
func Foo(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

-- want:basicwrappers/wrappers.go --
package basicwrappers

import __api "encore.dev/appruntime/apisdk/api"

type EncoreInternal_FooReq struct{}

type EncoreInternal_FooResp = __api.Void
-- want:encore.gen.go --
// Code generated by encore. DO NOT EDIT.

package basic

import "context"

// These functions are automatically generated and maintained by Encore
// to simplify calling them from other services, as they were implemented as methods.
// They are automatically updated by Encore whenever your API endpoints change.

// Interface defines the service's API surface area, primarily for mocking purposes.
//
// Raw endpoints are currently excluded from this interface, as Encore does not yet
// support service-to-service API calls to raw endpoints.
type Interface interface {
	Foo(ctx context.Context) error
}
-- want:encore_internal__api.go --
package basic

import (
	"context"
	__api "encore.dev/appruntime/apisdk/api"
	basicwrappers "example.com/basicwrappers"
	jsoniter "github.com/json-iterator/go"
	"net/http"
	"net/url"
)

func init() {
	__api.RegisterEndpoint(EncoreInternal_api_APIDesc_Foo, Foo)
}

var EncoreInternal_api_APIDesc_Foo = &__api.Desc[*basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq, basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp]{
	Access: __api.Public,
	AppHandler: func(ctx context.Context, reqData *basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq) (basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp, error) {
		err := Foo(ctx)
		if err != nil {
			return __api.Void{}, err
		}
		return __api.Void{}, nil
	},
	CloneReq: func(r *basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq) (*basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq, error) {
		var clone *basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq
		bytes, err := jsoniter.ConfigDefault.Marshal(r)
		if err == nil {
			err = jsoniter.ConfigDefault.Unmarshal(bytes, &clone)
		}
		return clone, err
	},
	CloneResp: func(r basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp) (basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp, error) {
		var clone basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp
		bytes, err := jsoniter.ConfigDefault.Marshal(r)
		if err == nil {
			err = jsoniter.ConfigDefault.Unmarshal(bytes, &clone)
		}
		return clone, err
	},
	DecodeExternalResp: func(httpResp *http.Response, json jsoniter.API) (resp basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp, err error) {
		return __api.Void{}, nil
	},
	DecodeReq: func(httpReq *http.Request, ps __api.UnnamedParams, json jsoniter.API) (reqData *basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq, pathParams __api.UnnamedParams, err error) {
		reqData = new(basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq)
		return reqData, nil, nil
	},
	DefLoc: uint32(0x0),
	EncodeExternalReq: func(reqData *basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooReq, stream *jsoniter.Stream) (httpHeader http.Header, queryString url.Values, err error) {
		return nil, nil, nil
	},
	EncodeResp: func(w http.ResponseWriter, json jsoniter.API, resp basicwrappers.EncoreInternal_FooResp, status int) (err error) {
		return nil
	},
	Endpoint:            "Foo",
	Fallback:            false,
	GlobalMiddlewareIDs: []string{},

	Path:                "/basic.Foo",
	PathParamNames:      nil,
	Raw:                 false,
	RawHandler:          nil,
